about_the_game:
AETHERNAUT is a first person puzzle game in the vein of Portal and Talos Principle. Set in a claustrophobic steampunk world, you must solve puzzle rooms using light, sensors, portals and time travel to gather the aether vials and access the core of the Construct.

You are guided by Doctor Louis Cornell who explains how the Construct came to be abandoned and why you were chosen to help save it. Soon however, unsettling voices start creeping into your mind, warning you against the doctor and pleading for your help.

Can you solve the puzzle of the Construct before its too late?

Solve over 100 puzzle rooms
Explore a vast open world by jumping, ledge grabbing and portaling
Master the three aether cubes through light driven puzzle design
Uncover the secrets of the Construct through voice recordings left by its citizens
Discover multiple endings depending on how you complete puzzles
Accessible gameplay with simple controls

AETHERNAUT is a first person puzzle game in the vein of Portal and Talos Principle. Set in a claustrophobic steampunk world, you must solve puzzle rooms using light, sensors, portals and time travel to gather the aether vials and access the core of the Construct.

You are guided by Doctor Louis Cornell who explains how the Construct came to be abandoned and why you were chosen to help save it. Soon however, unsettling voices start creeping into your mind, warning you against the doctor and pleading for your help.

Can you solve the puzzle of the Construct before its too late?

Solve over 100 puzzle rooms
Explore a vast open world by jumping, ledge grabbing and portaling
Master the three aether cubes through light driven puzzle design
Uncover the secrets of the Construct through voice recordings left by its citizens
Discover multiple endings depending on how you complete puzzles
Accessible gameplay with simple controls

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 or better video resolution with Vulkan support
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard onboard sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 or better video resolution with Vulkan support
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard onboard sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12.6 (Sierra)
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 or better video resolution with Metal support
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard onboard sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system with Metal support
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.12.6 (Sierra)
  • Processor: 1.8GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 or better video resolution with Metal support
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard onboard sound card
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system with Metal support

name: Aethernaut Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 3 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 560 4 GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard onboard sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or greater
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6 GB or AMD Radeon™ RX 590
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard onboard sound card
